title: GOP Congressional Candidate Ilario Pantano keeps stating his book Warlord is a best seller. I cannot find it on any best selling list.
text:
Amazon lists it as 1,582,860 on their book rankings, so it's in the
top 1.6 million best sellers.



We have not had a story that Ilario Pantano has declared his
candidacy

for Congress in 2014. Until then, the StarNews isn't going to worry

about trying to verify his statements. In fact, I usually refer

questions about active politicians to the Metro desk because I
don't

want MyReporter to become the go-to place for people with political

agendas.
